item.title: About Xiaozhe Yao
item.description: Xiaozhe Yao (姚晓哲) I am Xiaozhe Yao, currently a master student at the Institut für Informatik (IfI), Universität Zürich. Research Interest Machine Learning Model, Data and Application Management. AID. Learned Indexes and its application in databases EurusDB (private only). Machine Vision and Robotics. Machine Learning in Social Sciences. Publications In chronological order: Yao, Xiaozhe. “MLPM: Machine Learning Package Manager.” Workshop on MLOps, MLSys, 2020. Chen, Yingying, and Xiaozhe Yao.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: askxzyao@gmail.com Social GitHub Twitter LinkedIn

item.title: Projects
item.description: Active Projects AID - One Stop Machine Learning Model Management System. EurusDB. Datasets Crosstalk Dataset. Covid-19 Twitter Dataset. Open Source Community Analytical Dataset Past Projects Foodie: Comprehensive Food Recommendation. Tinynet: Implement Neural Network From Scratch. Covid-Sentiment: Analyse People’s Response to Covid-19 from Tweets. Demo Industry AI: Online Annotation for Image Datasets.
